column5: Folks, I am wondering why Lake Nipigon is rarely if ever discussed in this or other forums. It is a very large lake and would seem to be able to offer any number of opportunities for angling. I am off to Armstrong next week for a fly-out to a small lake, Gosling, in the area and the road there runs adjacent to Nipigon for many miles, thus the question.
Check out www.thunderbayfishing.com. The site has had a number of posts on Nipigon. Thunder Bay is fairly close to the Lake Nipigon area.
